name: Friendly Fire (clancywoodburn)
description: This game was created for the "GMTK Game Jam 2019", for the theme "only one." This theme spawned the difficult game, Friendly Fire. Friendly Fire is a bullet-hell game made up of only one control. Boost. Whenever you boost, bullets get fired at you, soon enough, what started as a blank screen turns into a frenzy of bullets across the screen. Do you play it safe, or do you go fast? It's all up to you.
